author: TrailerSpot
description:
Trailer For Avatar 3 Fire and Ash in 4K ULTRA HD Quality

Avatar Fire and Ash Plot : Jake and Neytiri's family grapples with grief after Neteyam's death, encountering a new, aggressive Na'vi tribe, the Ash People, who are led by the fiery Varang, as the conflict on Pandora escalates and a new moral focus emerges.

Avatar Fire and Ash is scheduled for release in the United States on December 19, 2025.

All The Videos In The Channel Are Enhanced To 4K (3840 × 2160 px; also known as Ultra HD and UHD) Quality.
title: Ash People Vs Sully Kids | AVATAR 3 FIRE AND ASH (2025) Movie CLIP 4K
